etymons.meaning: to have power, dominate, rule; to oppress powerfully

Imperativ.turoyo: w tre=fərṭaʕnemšaléṭun-ne aʕlayye d-nəktən-ne d-maḥisi, d-saymən-ne kēf w ḥanake 186; 97/19;

Preterite.turoyo: E aṯən, mšalṭi, mšalaṭ bi žənke bi žənke d təlyowayle w maḥtowayle bi aṯto du baqoro. ‘’ Yes, they came, they rushed, he rushed upon the woman, upon the woman that had brought him up, upon the shepherd’s wife.’’ 004_NE_DİTİN HEZAR.; 02:54

Part. Pass..turoyo: ŭnorḥəmli u=bayt-anoġắlabe m-u=săbab, d-kət-yomšalṭoʕal u=Boġāz, w ʕal i=xaṣraḥretodə-Ṣṭambul175; 4/14;
